18.02.2003 SH SCR2275/SCR2539 If no client totals were written to XML -->
- Client total XML-File = 0, the hole already written xml-files will be deleted
- and the new created record in REPA will also deleted.
17.02.2003 SH SCR2935 Added new parameter "pi.onlynot financed"
- and reduced selection of invoces with this new parameter if 'Y'.
17.02.2003 SH SCR2675 BXA002B and BXA002C -->Repalced separate selection task
- by one combined selection task, so that it's possible to have a concatination
- of diff. extra selection criterias (pi.markcode, pi.onlyfinaced,
- pi.onlynotfinaced, pi.daysoverdue) --> reducing selection of invoices
07.02.2003 SH SCR2964 Changed calulation of L9.Not financed from SUM of
- INVA_ACTAFACTORING to SUM of INVA_ACTASPECIAL
07.02.2003 SH SCR2944 "BXA002B Invoices daysoverdue" --> The calculation of
- PI.DATE - INVO_DUEDATE > PI.DAYSOVERDUE is not working properly on AS400,
- the result is a numeric with decimals and were are not able to use this result
- for the selection of invoices.
- New solution: First we have to calculate a date (v.DATE_COMPARED) which
- contents the highest date for the selection of invoices, means if PI.DATE =
- 07.02.2003 and PI.DAYSOVERDUE = 90 the new calculated day will be
- the 09.11.2002. Then we will select only invoices with INVO_DUEDATE <
- v.DATE_COMPARED.
- In "BXA002E Due invoices" we also have to select only invoices with
- INVO_DUEDATE < v.DATE_COMPARED
Since we change CODE to MEMORY/ISAM we have to
remove CTL-H expression from BXA002T006 ReadCODEToMemory
CTL_H expression for ISAM table leads to activation of OPNQRYF command
and abnormal termination of the task.
04.12.2002 SCR2651 SH Add new parameter pi_printerqueue and send it to BXA900
- as argument
GB730 supports Windows AND OS400 now; removed distinction
the concatenation of the chunks actually is a cat chunk >> outpitfile
If outputfile does not yet exist (first chunk) it is created by the system and
this defaults to use EBCDIC.
To avoid that we let Magic create an empty file before the ChunkLoop is entered
major changes in BXA002. The debtor XML is now divided into parts (chunks) to
to avoid a problem with exponential bad performance in merge module if the
merge taget is big and has to be closed (flushed to disk).
Implementation is done by introducing temp. table TX02 which gets the
relevant DEBC records + a bulk (chunk) number. Task BXA002T007 BXA002B ChunkLoop
loops over these chunks.
08.10.2002 ONLY for TESTS --> Set VERIFY in BXA002 and BXA002B to calculate
- the closing time of the "Debtor-XML-File", have to be removed after test.
//29-10-2002 JP SCR #2434 change place of MLSTRANS() in due invoices

CLIENTTOTAL and DEBTOR = 0 then the concatenation and send to queue will be
skipped and the REPA row will be deleted.

code description for type=2 and 51 into a memory table. Then we replace the
original code dictionary table in task BXA002CInvoices with the memory table
2) we replace all calls to GB004 with Link Query to the new Code memory table
3) we replace variable input-params in DSQL statements from numeric to char,
e.g. amdno to str (admno,'4'), clntno to str (clntno,'5')
4) we change the building of where clauses with markcodes from
invo_markcodespec<>0 to >0 and the same for markcodetext

ExpSyntax.val: NOT(FileExist (Trim ({1,123}))) AND NOT(FileExist (Trim ({1,119}))) AND NOT(FileExist (Trim ({1,121}))) AND NOT(FileExist (Trim ({1,122}))) AND NOT(FileExist (Trim ({1,117})))
NOT(FileExist (Trim ({1,121}))) AND NOT(FileExist (Trim ({1,122}))) AND NOT(FileExist (Trim ({1,117}))) AND NOT ({0,2})
'start creating temp. TX02 for chunk calculation'
'creating empty cat target to avoid EBCDIC ...'
IF ({0,8}='',MlsTrans ('Only not financed invoices'),Trim ({0,8})&', '&MlsTrans ('Only not financed invoices'))
IF ({0,8}='',MlsTrans ('Only invoices with dunning stop'),Trim ({0,8})&', '&MlsTrans ('Only invoices with dunning stop'))

Text.val: // DSQL task which fills temp. table TX02 with data from
// V_BXA002_001. The temp. table was introduced to
// get the possibility to split into groups of x Records and
// thereby reduce the size of XML (by splitting it according to these groups)
// DSQL task which deletes records in temp. table TX02 created for this run

SQL_STMT_U.val: INSERT INTO :1/TX02 ( BXA002_SEQNO, BXA002_BULK, BXA002_RECNO, DEBC_ADMNO, DEBC_CLNTNO, DEBC_DUNNINGSTOP, DEBC_NO, DEBC_DEBC, DEBC_DEBH, DEBC_ZIP, DEBC_NAME, DEBC_ADDRESS, DEBC_CITY, DEBC_COUNTRY, DEBC_CLCURR, DEBC_CREDITLIMIT, DEBC_CLTC_TEXTCODE1, DEBC_CLTC_TEXTCODE2, DEBC_CLTC_TEXTCODE3, DEBC_CODECREDITLIMIT, DEBC_DEBHBUYGROUP, DEBC_AUTOCOLLECTPOSSIBLE, DEBC_FINANCELIMIT, DEBC_FINANCELIMITCURR, DEBH_HADR_NAME1, DEBH_HADR_ADDRESS, DEBH_HADR_CITY, DEBH_HADR_NAME2, DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY, DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH, DEBH_COMMERCIALOWNER_DEBH1) SELECT :2 AS NSEQ, 0 AS BULKC, 0 AS RECNO, DEBC_ADMNO, DEBC_CLNTNO, DEBC_DUNNINGSTOP, DEBC_NO, DEBC_DEBC, DEBC_DEBH, DEBC_ZIP, DEBC_NAME, DEBC_ADDRESS, DEBC_CITY, DEBC_COUNTRY, DEBC_CLCURR, DEBC_CREDITLIMIT, DEBC_CLTC_TEXTCODE1, DEBC_CLTC_TEXTCODE2, DEBC_CLTC_TEXTCODE3, DEBC_CODECREDITLIMIT, DEBC_DEBHBUYGROUP, DEBC_AUTOCOLLECTPOSSIBLE, DEBC_FINANCELIMIT, DEBC_FINANCELIMITCURR, DEBH_HADR_NAME1, DEBH_HADR_ADDRESS, DEBH_HADR_CITY, DEBH_HADR_NAME2, DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY, DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH, DEBH_COMMERCIALOWNER_DEBH1 FROM :1/V_BXA002_01 DEB WHERE DEBC_ADMNO=:3 AND DEBC_CLNTNO=:4 :5 :6

Text.val: // DSQL task which fills temp. table TX02 with data from
// V_BXA002_001. The temp. table was introduced to
// get the possibility to split into groups of x Records and
// thereby reduce the size of XML (by splitting it according to these groups)
// DSQL task which creates records in temp. table TX02 based on range and sort
// criteria given in input parameters
// this is a loop over the debtor "chunks"
// we needed to reduce the number of debtors in result XML to avoid
// exponential bad performance of merge module when closing the
// target file of output merge operation.
-- Loop over debtor clients will be stopped immediately if only
-- the totals (BXA002E) have to be printed v.onlytotals = 'Y'
-- therefore see T.S.
-- get sort criteria in case of PI.SORT = 9 (country sort, performed by XML)
// name of buying group, if there's
// code description for DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY
-- Code description for DEBC_COUNTRY
// code describtion for code credit limit
-- WhereClauses used in BXA002E/G/H/J
-- Need to write debtor infos to XML BXA002D
-- Trigger if invoices exist according to selection
-- Build WHERECLAUSES
-- Will be executed only for the last debtors bulk
-- Build first DSQL-WHERE_CLAUSE (s)
-- Init with blanc if there were no special selections exist.
-- No markcode was selected in OXA300B, reduce selection with....
-- relevant for BXA002H
-- relevant for BXA002I
-- reduce invoice range ...
-- BXA002E Start Client overview only if
write records to the temp file because the sql query is with case
and doesn't create records if they not answer the condition and for
the sort order
-- Print all detailed invoices
-- First build totals per debtor, it's necessarily to do this first, because all
- fields which have to printed to XML in the current task have to be calculated
- We can not do the calculations if the invoices will be printed to XML,
- because the structure of the XML file (See template "v.OPL_DEBTOR_TemplateFile
- do not allow this.
-- Only if invoices were selected for the current debtor
-- Write debtor and invoices to XML --> BXA002D
-- Special handling if DEBC_CODECREDITLIMIT=2
-- Calculate sales and external limit for report (not country Poland)
//strip variables for XML chars
.. reset variables
-- Write invoices per debtor to XML
-- If min. one invoice exist for one debtor we have to print the overview with
- BXA002E --> see T.S.
-- End Block --> -- Only if invoices were selected for the current debtor
-- Reset trigger and virtuals
--End Block --> Print all detailed invoices

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT case when b.ddiff > 120 then 'in > 120 days' when b.ddiff > 90 and b.ddiff < 121 then 'in 91 - 120 days' when b.ddiff > 60 and b.ddiff < 91 then 'in 61 - 90 days' when b.ddiff > 30 and b.ddiff < 61 then 'in 31 - 60 days' when b.ddiff > 0 and b.ddiff < 31 then 'in 1 - 30 days' when b.ddiff = 0 then 'Today' when b.ddiff <0 and b.ddiff >-31 then 'since 1 - 30 days' when b.ddiff <-30 and b.ddiff >-61 then 'since 31 - 60 days' when b.ddiff <-60 and b.ddiff >-91 then 'since 61 - 90 days' when b.ddiff <-90 and b.ddiff >-121 then 'since 91 - 120 days' when b.ddiff <-120 then 'since > 120 days' else '' end DUE_CLASS, cast(SUM(b.INVA_ACTAFACTORING) as decimal(18,2)), cast(SUM(b.INVA_ACTASPECIAL) as decimal(18,2)) FROM ( SELECT INVO_NO,INVO_DEBC_NO, INVO_ADMNO, INVO_CLNTNO, INVO_DUEDATE, INVO_MARKCODESPEC,INVO_MARKCODETEXT,INVO_CURRENCY, INVA_CURRENCY , DAYS(INVO_DUEDATE)-DAYS(':7') DDIFF, INVA_ACTAFACTORING, INVA_ACTASPECIAL FROM :3/INVO I LEFT OUTER JOIN :3/INVA IA ON I.INVO_NO=IA.INVA_NO ) AS B, :3/DEBC A WHERE b.INVO_ADMNO=:1 AND b.INVO_CLNTNO=:2 AND b.INVO_DEBC_NO=a.DEBC_NO and b.inva_currency=':5' :4 :6 :8 group by case when b.ddiff > 120 then 'in > 120 days' when b.ddiff > 90 and b.ddiff < 121 then 'in 91 - 120 days' when b.ddiff > 60 and b.ddiff < 91 then 'in 61 - 90 days' when b.ddiff > 30 and b.ddiff < 61 then 'in 31 - 60 days' when b.ddiff > 0 and b.ddiff < 31 then 'in 1 - 30 days' when b.ddiff = 0 then 'Today' when b.ddiff <0 and b.ddiff >-31 then 'since 1 - 30 days' when b.ddiff <-30 and b.ddiff >-61 then 'since 31 - 60 days' when b.ddiff <-60 and b.ddiff >-91 then 'since 61 - 90 days' when b.ddiff <-90 and b.ddiff >-121 then 'since 91 - 120 days' when b.ddiff <-120 then 'since > 120 days' else '' end

Text.val: sql query that calculate totals for all the invoices and seperated to
... Output parameter has to be alpha, not casted to Graphic in DSQL, stoarge type = String memo
//29-10-2002 JP SCR #2434 change place of MLSTRANS()
//insert MLSTRANS() function from "BXA002E Write temp table" here
deleting the temp table before creating the range days
in task write records
creating the range days
09-OCT-2002 AS, put a MLSTRANS around pi_title expression in Link Create
//29-10-2002 JP remove this translation. If we put it here we get no ageing
output because of the view in "BXA002EDue invoices" which cannot range on the
translated values !!! Put it directly in the task when writing the XML file.

SQL_STMT_U.val: select b.invo_currency,d.debh_hadr_country,cast(sum(b.invo_aactuali) as decimal(18,2)),cast(sum(c.inva_actafactoring) as decimal(18,2)),cast(sum(c.inva_actaspecial) as decimal(18,2)) from :3/invo b, :3/debc a,:3/inva c,:3/debh d where b.INVO_ADMNO=:1 and b.INVO_CLNTNO=:2 and b.INVO_DEBc_NO=a.debc_no and d.debh_no=b.invo_debh_no and c.inva_no=b.invo_no and c.inva_currency=':5' :4 :6 :7 group by b.invo_currency,d.debh_hadr_country FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS

Text.val: sql query that uses the temp table to create for every debc_country ,
invo_currency combination
-- In case of GNRL_CODE='NL' the sales amount has to be calc for CC-Overview

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(e.dcmo_totasalesdebtnotes - e.dcmo_totasalescrednotes) as decimal(13,2)) from :9/dcmo e where e.dcmo_year = :3 and e.dcmo_currency=':5' and e.dcmo_debc_no in (select a.debc_no from :9/debc a, :9/debh d, :9/invo b, :9/inva c where a.debc_admno = :1 and a.debc_clntno = :2 and b.invo_debc_no=a.debc_NO and d.debh_no=a.debc_debh and d.debh_hadr_country=':4' and c.inva_no=b.invo_no and c.inva_currency=':5' :6 :7 :8) FOR FETCH ONLY

Text.val: -- In case of GNRL_CODE='NL' the sales amount has to be calc for CC-Overview

SQL_STMT_U.val: select b.invo_markcodespec ,cast(sum(c.inva_actafactoring) as decimal(18,2)),cast(sum(c.inva_actaspecial)as decimal(18,2)) from :3/invo b, :3/debc a,:3/inva c where b.INVO_ADMNO=:1 and b.INVO_CLNTNO=:2 and b.INVO_DEBc_NO=a.debc_no and c.inva_no=b.invo_no and c.inva_currency=':4' :5 :6 :7 :8 group by b.invo_markcodespec ORDER BY b.invo_markcodespec FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS

Text.val: sql query also use the temp table for every invo_markcodespec<> 0

SQL_STMT_U.val: select b.invo_markcodetext ,cast(sum(c.inva_actafactoring) as decimal(18,2)),cast(sum(c.inva_actaspecial)as decimal(18,2)) from :3/invo b, :3/debc a,:3/inva c where b.INVO_ADMNO=:1 and b.INVO_CLNTNO=:2 and b.INVO_DEBc_NO=a.debc_no and c.inva_no=b.invo_no and c.inva_currency=':4' :5 :6 :7 :8 group by b.invo_markcodetext ORDER BY b.invo_markcodetext FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS

Text.val: sql query also use the temp table for every invo_markcodespec<> 0

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT a.debc_debhbuygroup,cast(sum(debc_creditlimit) as decimal(18)),cast(sum(c.inva_actaspecial) as decimal(18,2)), cast(sum(c.inva_actafactoring) +sum(inva_actaspecial) as decimal(18,2)) FROM :3/debc a,:3/invo b,:3/inva c WHERE a.debc_admno=:1 and a.debc_clntno=:2 and a.debc_debhbuygroup>0 and b.invo_debc_no=a.debc_no and b.invo_no=c.inva_no and c.inva_currency=':4' :5 :6 :7 group by a.debc_debhbuygroup order by a.debc_debhbuygroup FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(SUM(DCMO_TOTASALESDEBTNOTES - DCMO_TOTASALESCREDNOTES) as decimal(18,2)) from :1/dcmo where DCMO_DEBC_NO = :2 and DCMO_YEAR = :3 and DCMO_CURRENCY = ':4' for fetch only

adding a record to report archive
// this tasks loops over the TX02 records inserted in BXA002T002

// BULL (chunk) number and record number (whiuch have been inserted with 0
// in BXA002T002
// creates the target file where the ckunks which are merged in BXA002T007 are
